title: Lidosporin 5ML Drops
formula:
Polymyxin B and Lignocaine, Ear
GSK
details:
Ear pain is considered to be very painful, and if it is not treated in a proper way, it can result badly. For this purpose, GSK, which is a well know pharmaceutical firm, has got a solution. They have got Lidosporin ear drops, that is used for th

READ MORE
precautions: Use with caution if you have other ear problem, in ear drum or ear infection. Before using this medicine, consult your doctor or pharmacist if you have, other ear problems (e.g., a hole in your eardrum, middle ear infection), an ear infection caused by a virus (e.g., herpes simplex, varicella).
effects: Almost most of the medicines have got side effects. Applying these ear drops can cause the following side effects:Allergic Reaction: Applying this ear drop can cause a serious sort of allergic reaction that can be harmful for the skin if it is not treated in a proper way.Rash: Rash is considered to be a very common side effect of almost every ear drop. However, it seems to be very rare. But applying Lidosporin ear drops may cause rashes around the ear.Itching and swelling: Both itching and swelling are the side effects of Lidosporin ear drops. Both can be caused because of applying these ear drops. Itching and swelling can be caused on the face, ear, tongue, and even in the throat as well.Trouble in breathing manner:Â However, it does not happen normally, and it is a very rare side effect of this ear drop. But if it happens, then immediately contact the concerned doctor as if it is not treated properly, it can result negatively.It can cause stinging and burning of ear.

title: Genticyn 7.5ML Drops
details: This medication is used to treat bacterial infections (such as blepharitis, conjunctivitis) of the eye and the skin around the eyes (such as eyelids). It is also used to prevent infection after eye injury or surgery.
precautions: Tell your doctor/Pharmacist if you are Allergic to it or to other aminoglycoside antibiotics (such as tobramycin) or if you have any other allergies.
effects: Stinging/Burning/Redness or Temporary blurred vision may occur.

title: Otosporin 5ML Drops
formula:
Polymyxin B, Neomycin & Hydrocortisone, Ear
GSK
details:
Otosporin is a prescription medicine that contains anti-inflammatory, anti-allergic, and antipruritic activity. It is used by people having suspected tympanic membrane.

If we discuss Otosporin availability in Pakistan, it is available in me

READ MORE
precautions: Some of the Otosporin ears drops precautions are described below one by one.It can cause hypersensitivity to corticosteroids.Its use for an extended period can cause infection as it has a steroid masking effect.Otosporin's prolonged use leads to skin sensitivity, and resistant organisms also take shape.Otosporin produces hydrocortisone, which masks the allergic effects produced by it.Its use without medical benefit for a long time may lead to total deafness.
effects: Some of the Otosporin side effects are following.It can cause burning if the drop reaches the middle ear.Its rare side effects are headaches, irritation, pain, rashes, stinging, skin, etc.

title: Xecomb 10ML Drops
formula:
Triamcinolone, Neomycin, Gramicidin and Nystatin, Ear
Sante
details: It is used to relieve itching, burning, pain or inflammation of the outer ear and ear canal when it is infected or likely to be infected.
precautions: Please consult your doctor or Pharmcist

title: Kunoxy 5ML Ear Drops 1x1 (P)
details: This medication is used to treat a variety of Bacterial Ear infections.
precautions: Tell your doctor/Pharmacist your medical history of, Seizure disorder, Brain/Head injury, Brain tumors, Peripheral neuropathy, Kidney disease, Liver disease, Depression, Myasthenia gravis, Tendonitis, Bursitis, Aneurysm or Blockage of the aorta or other blood vessels, Hardening of the arteries, Hypertension, Marfan syndrome, Ehlers-Danlos syndrome. During pregnancy, this medication should be used only when clearly needed.
effects: Upset stomach, Nausea, Diarrhea, Headache, Dizziness, Lightheadedness, or Trouble sleeping may occur.
